document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">"Faithful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">end" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">amended </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">From </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Heavenly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">clause </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Lucrative </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">indeed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">offer </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4ffd4">withdraws </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">will </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">give", </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">base </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Proviso </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Spare </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">your </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">"Crown </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bce454">Life" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Those </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c06cff">fits </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">fair </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">wear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Try </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">on </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Yourself </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: "Faithful to the end" amended
